name: Mellow Fields
description:
Description:

Mellow Fields is a feelgood game in which the player follows a creature that moved out of its parents' home and discovered a new place to live at.

Lean back and sink into a cozy world where you can collect material, craft items and design your home as you wish.

The game is based on the topic of how gameplay mechanics can motivate players and create a feelgood-effect.

Controls:

The game is played with both the mouse and the keyboard.

W, A, S, D: Movement

Space: Jump

Left Click: Interaction/Move Items/Place items

R: Rotate items

Q: Drop items

Tab: Inventory

1-8: Quick Inventory

Esc: Pause menu/close dialogues

All third party assets are credited in the build.

This game was created at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Supervised by: Lena Falkenhagen & Jessica Kathmann

"Mellow Fields"  (WinterSemester 2022/23)
